sections.summary: a customer service representative in the hospitality industry seeking employment with a well-established company to further build my experience in the hospitality industry, with the skills i've learnt as a medical assistant and also my prior experience in the service industry. my goal is to ensure positive and safe travels. highlights cheerful and energetic dependable and reliable effective team player active listening flexible scheduling verbal/written communication
